summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2356 for the improvement of the Alley in Block Thirty (30), Heirs of Sarah A. Bell's Second Addition, being the alley from Pine Street to Pike Street and between Eighth Avenue and Ninth Avenue, all in The City of Seattle, by grading the same; under Ordinance No. 24406 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
